name: Hall Pass
description:
Press SPACE to jump and collect the tape!

Press and hold B-R-E-A-K at the same time to break through the rules!

Our submission for Mini Jame Gam 16

This is our first game as a team

In Hall Pass, you literally have to break through the rules to stop the evil Principal Snively who is trying to send you to detention!

Collect the tape to stop his unruly rule making!

Code by redh53

Art by sourdoge
